hero.title: Web experiences crafted for daring, thoughtful brands.
hero.body: We build digital flagships for ambitious brands — blending design, technology, and storytelling into one seamless experience.
hero.caption: Immersive prototyping session
hero.captionBody: Captured inside Arsy Studio's Jakarta residency.

services.title: Tailored digital programs, built with intent.
services.body: Storytelling, interaction, and systems crafted to feel luxurious yet effortless.

web.title: Web Application Development
web.body: We build fast, reliable, and scalable web systems designed around your business needs.

mobile.title: Mobile Application Development
mobile.body: We craft intuitive, lightweight mobile apps that deliver a seamless user experience across every device.

brand.title: Design & Branding
brand.body: We help shape a visual identity that's consistent and full of character — making your brand recognizable and memorable.

cases.title: Fewer projects, deeper impact.
cases.body: A glimpse at builds that combine research, art direction, and technical rigor.

atlas.title: Atlas Maritime
atlas.summary: Crafted a cinematic site for an ocean logistics fund with live data visualisation and investor briefing centre.

coast.title: Coastline Rituals
coast.summary: Luxury skincare collective with scroll-triggered storytelling, live inventory, and editorial commerce.

atelier.title: Atelier Nomad
atelier.summary: Interactive portfolio for an interior studio blending CG rooms, film, and a concierge brief tool.

solstice.title: Solstice Mobility
solstice.summary: Modular product site for an EV startup with immersive configurator, charging map, and investor narrative.

noir.title: Noir Residences
noir.summary: Cinematic hospitality platform with multi-property booking, ambient motion, and private guest portal.

studio.title: Meticulous process, soulful detail.
studio.body: Quick check-ins each phase keep milestones aligned.

planning.title: Planning & Strategy
planning.body: We'll collaborate to define your website's goals, audience, and core features. Together, we'll shape the site's structure, navigation, and content priorities.

design.title: Design & Development
design.body: Once the plan is set, we move from sketches to code - blending creativity and precision. You'll receive regular updates as your vision turns into something tangible.

launch.title: Launch & Beyond
launch.body: Here's where everything comes to life. We bring the final build online, ensure everything runs smoothly, and celebrate the launch like it deserves.

aboutPreview.title: Certified hands, simple guarantees.
aboutPreview.body: Every build is handled by trusted specialists, covered by quality checks, after-sales care, and a refund promise.

points.quality: Layered quality checks keep the finish immaculate.
points.support: After-sales care that actually sticks around.
points.refund: Refund promise if the site ever disappoints.

philosophy.title: Collaboration & precision.
philosophy.subtitle: We believe remarkable work comes from shared focus and care for every detail. Each touchpoint must stay useful, elegant, and rooted in your audience.

expertise.title: What we handle
expertise.body: A few disciplines we lead every week:

paragraphs.one: Every engagement begins with listening. We study the business, the people who use it, and the tension we must solve before sketching solutions.
paragraphs.two: Strategy, design, and engineering stay connected so launches feel refined and stay maintainable long after handoff.

testimonials.title: Clients choose us for neat work.
testimonials.body: From apps to hotels, we guide each step together.

lumina.quote: Arsy Studio treated our relaunch like choreography. They translated dense regulation into a luxurious flow without adding friction.
lumina.author: Maya Karim

seraya.quote: The team built an editorial commerce system with motion states that feel like touching fabric. They anticipated every scenario.
seraya.author: Evelyn Hart

noir.quote: We needed a site that sells suites without shouting. Arsy delivered a cinematic CMS that our concierge updates effortlessly.
noir.author: Darren Lim

manifesto.lead: We take on fewer engagements so every detail can be tuned until it feels effortlessly premium.

principles.strategy: Technology follows strategy — never the other way around.

manifesto.ctaBody: If you value detail, consistency, and care, we’re already aligned.

hero.title: A digital studio rooted in Bandung.
hero.body: We mix design, engineering, and story so brands feel alive online. Everything starts by understanding the people behind the idea.
hero.detail: Great experiences come from balancing function with feeling.
hero.secondary: We stay close to the humans who will use what we build so every interaction feels considered.

card.title: Bandung born, globally present.
card.body: Partners, engineers, and writers share one table during every review.

who.title: A small studio with a warm touch.
who.body: We grew up in Bandung's creative energy and still believe technology should feel human and collaborative.

roots.title: Roots in Bandung
roots.body: Raised in Bandung’s creative scene. We keep that warmth in every partnership.

craft.title: Design, build, care
craft.body: We shape digital products so brands meet people in warm, intuitive moments.

relationships.title: Long-term relationships
relationships.body: We focus on trust so every collaboration stays open and lasting.

items.one: Deliver quality digital solutions with a creative, user-centered mindset.
items.two: Provide service that aligns with every client's needs and goals.
items.three: Drive business growth through innovation and technology.

process.title: A rhythm of listening, crafting, sustaining.

listen.title: Listen & understand
listen.body: We hear your goals and audience first.

craft.title: Design & build
craft.body: Sketches become interfaces that feel refined.

sustain.title: Sustain & evolve
sustain.body: We stay nearby after launch so everything keeps working.

cta.title: Tell us about the next big thing you want to build.
cta.body: We love working with people who have a vision. Share the idea, brand, or challenge and we'll translate it into a living digital experience.

hero.title: Programs engineered with editorial calm.
hero.body: We choreograph strategy, design, and engineering under one roof so every launch feels cinematic, precise, and human.
hero.detail: Two launches at a time. Senior partners in every room. No handoffs.

card.label: Partner access
card.title: Direct rooms, shared rituals.
card.body: Work directly with the partners and makers shipping your flagship.

offerings.title: A boutique menu crafted for digital flagships.
offerings.body: Every program blends narrative, craft, and systems thinking so your product feels premium yet effortless.

web.title: Flagship web programs
web.body: Experience strategy, responsive systems, and headless CMS tailored for marketing and product teams.

product.title: Product & mobile systems
product.body: Cross-platform interfaces, design systems, and app experiences that stay lightweight yet expressive.

brand.title: Brand & content systems
brand.body: Visual identity refresh, motion direction, and content playbooks that keep every touchpoint consistent.

discover.title: Listen & script
discover.body: Immersion sessions, research, and alignment workshops shape the narrative and product requirements.

build.title: Design & engineer
build.body: Design systems, prototypes, and code evolve in parallel so momentum stays high without sacrificing detail.

launch.title: Stage & sustain
launch.body: Staging, QA, and integration orchestration lead into launch, followed by rituals for optimisation.

stack.title: Modern stack, timeless restraint.
stack.body: We pick tools for longevity and comfort, then stay on the loop to keep them sharp.

cta.title: Let’s choreograph the next flagship together.
cta.body: Bring the brief, the hunch, or the product roadmap. We’ll respond with a tailored plan in under 24 hours.

hero.title: Let's make your launch feel inevitable.
hero.body: Share the deck, the half-written brief, or even just a hunch. We'll respond with a clear path forward within 24 hours.
hero.detail: We cap ourselves at two concurrent engagements so every build feels cinematic and controlled.
hero.cardSubcopy: Send the deck, challenge, or even a whisper of an idea.

channels.title: Choose the path that fits your pace.
channels.subtitle: Every conversation routes directly to partners and directors.

email.title: Write to us
email.body: Send context, timelines, and ambitions. You'll receive a POV and next steps shortly.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp the studio
whatsapp.body: Perfect for fast gut-checks, voice notes, or introductions between teams.

workshop.title: Request a workshop
workshop.body: Book a 45-minute working session to map scope, squads, and success metrics.

availability.title: Two builds at a time, always senior-led.
availability.body: Sprints run 6-8 weeks with research, design, and engineering layered in parallel.
availability.detail: Need a different working model? We'll architect a bespoke collaboration.

panel.title: Tell us what you want the internet to feel like.
panel.body: We take on two launches at a time to preserve care. Share your hunch, deck, or challenge.

reasons.build: Shaping a flagship, product, or fund launch
reasons.refresh: Refreshing an existing property without losing equity
reasons.partner: Looking for a long-term design + engineering partner

hero.title: Notes on design, engineering, and brand rhythm.
hero.body: A running log of ideas from inside the studio — spanning research rituals, technical decisions, and founder learnings.

ai-selection.title: Choosing the right AI studio for your flagship.
ai-selection.excerpt: Founders are rewriting their roadmap with AI components, but the question remains: who engineers the system while preserving the brand's tactility?

software-house.title: Software house agency: bridging ideas and systems.
software-house.excerpt: Blending service design, engineering, and growth rituals keeps experiments steady while brands explore new markets.

ux-export.title: Why Indonesian UX studios are shaping global launches.
ux-export.excerpt: From craft typography to modern stacks, studios across Jakarta and Bandung export cultural sensitivity into global products.

events-series.title: Inside our founder forum series.
events-series.excerpt: We gathered product leads and CMOs to trade notes about hybrid launches, in-person experiences, and the state of headless CMS.

hero.title: Portfolio built with calm precision.
hero.body: A boutique mix of web platforms, mobile apps, and embedded teams crafted for founders who expect cinematic polish.
hero.detail: Every build is senior-led, research-driven, and released in concert with your teams.

card.label: Snapshot
card.title: 65+ launches
card.body: From fintech platforms to luxury retail, each project blends story, design, and engineering.

ppid.title: PPID Kemendagri
ppid.description: National public information platform built as a twin mobile + web experience so citizens can access updates from any province.

bmw.title: BMW Group Indonesia
bmw.description: Embedded engineering squad delivering automation and analytics inside BMW’s internal tooling stack.

amura.title: Amura Beauty
amura.description: Commerce flagship for a skincare collective with tactile storytelling, shoppable editorials, and localized checkout.

kideco.title: KIDECO Energy
kideco.description: Sustainability reporting hub for one of Indonesia’s largest energy groups, pairing data visualisation with investor tooling.

bpjs.title: BPJS Ketenagakerjaan
bpjs.description: End-to-end redesign of the national social security portal with accessibility, search, and guided workflows.

diri.title: Diri Care
diri.description: Personal care companion app connecting users with treatments, concierge support, and personalised regimens.
